knimeNode.name: FastSam2Bam
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts sam to bam files in parallel.

fullDescription.intro: Converts efficiently SAM files into the compressed BAM format using multiple threads in parallel and creates an index file.
fullDescription.option: dpath to the picard tools installation

option.name: path to genome in fasta format

fullDescription.option: path to the genome which was used for alignment
number of cores which should be used for conversion
path where the temp files should be stored (must be fast)
uses /dev/shm which is a memory device in some unix distributions as temp folder
deletes the SAM file after conversion; dangerous option because if conversion fails and is not correctly detected the sam file is lost!

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Path to BAM file
Cell 1: Path to index file
